                                   ActionManager.EventContext eventContext,
                                   ImportLog log)

                                   InputParseError,
                                   InvalidXmlDocument,
                                   InvalidInputFormatError
        Import an InputStream with an event context.
        Parameters:
        ios - the InputStream to import
        eventContext - the event that this import is part of
